alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued April 15 at 9:13AM EDT until April 15 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Northwest Suffolk, Northeast Suffolk, Southwest Suffolk, Southeast Suffolk and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The dense fog advisory may need to be extended into this evening if visibilities do not improve early this afternoon.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
